Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-CoV-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alinity m SARS-CoV-2 real-time RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA on the automated Alinity m System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in nasopharyngeal and anterior nasal swab specimens from symptomatic patients as an aid in the diagnosis of COVID-19, used with the automated Alinity m System in conjunction with other clinical findings.
